model.online

Class ServerClientThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • model.online.ServerClientThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerClientThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class is in charge of getting and sending information from the client that is associated with this thread
    Author:
    PMC

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run()
      This methods runs the thread, and its mission is to get information from the client and subsequently sending it to server
      void sendChooseTeamToClient(org.json.JSONObject gameConfigJSON)
      This method creates a new JSON given the sent one from server, putting in it the notification of chooseTeam so that the client knows that this information should be used in order to let the user choose one of the teams included in the JSON sent
      void sendToClient(org.json.JSONObject json)
      This methods sends a given information from the server to the client
      void sendUpdateGraphicsToClient(org.json.JSONObject json)
      This method creates a new JSON given the sent one from server, putting in it the notification of updateGraphics so that the client knows that this information should be used in order to update its GUI

      • sendUpdateGraphicsToClient

        public void sendUpdateGraphicsToClient(org.json.JSONObject json)
        This method creates a new JSON given the sent one from server, putting in it the notification of updateGraphics so that the client knows that this information should be used in order to update its GUI
        Parameters:
        json - Information sent by server

      • sendChooseTeamToClient

        public void sendChooseTeamToClient(org.json.JSONObject gameConfigJSON)
        This method creates a new JSON given the sent one from server, putting in it the notification of chooseTeam so that the client knows that this information should be used in order to let the user choose one of the teams included in the JSON sent
        Parameters:
        gameConfigJSON - Information sent by server
